original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū pallatthikāya nisinnassa dhammaṁ desenti …pe….
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū pallatthikāya nisinnassa dhammaṃ desenti pe

original: “Na pallatthikāya nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṁ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
analyzed: na pallatthikāya nisinnassa a gilānassa dhammam desessāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati

original: Na pallatthikāya nisinnassa agilānassa dhammo desetabbo.
analyzed: na pallatthikāya nisinnassa a gilānassa dhammaḥ desetabbo

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca hatthapallatthikāya vā dussapallatthikāya vā nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṁ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca hattha pallatthikāya vā dussa pallatthikāya vā nisinnassa a gilānassa dhammam deseti āpatti dukkaṭassa
